pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kalman Filter // 'Rcpp' implementation of the multivariate Kalman filter for state space models that can handle missing values and exogenous data in the observation and state equations. Kim, Chang-Jin and Charles R. Nelson (1999) "State-Space Models with Regime Switching: Classical and Gibbs-Sampling Approaches with Applications" doi:10.7551/mitpress/6444.001.0001http://econ.kor ea.ac.kr/~cjkim/.
